title: Budowanie przyszłości kopalni
description: Innowacyjna kopania stworzona dla nowoczesnego górnictwa krypto walut.

coin_earnings_cards.estimated_tooltip: Szacowane zarobki bazują na wydajności wydobycia z ostatnich 7 dni w naszej kopalni.
coin_earnings_cards.more_description: Pracujemy nad uruchomieniem wielu nowych kopalni w najbliższej przyszłości. Dołącz do naszych grup na Discord lub Telegram, aby być na bieżąco z aktualnościami.

mined_coins_section.title: Krypto waluty, które kopiemy
mined_coins_section.description: Flexpool jest kopalnią multi-kryptowalutową, oznacza to, że z nami możesz wykopać swoje ulubione monety.

eth.title: About Ethereum
eth.description: Ethereum is a worldwide computer created to power Decentralized Applications known as Smart Contracts.

calculator.title: Income Calculator
calculator.title_tooltip: The Estimated Income is calculated based on the 24-hour average network difficulty and the 24-hour average block reward. This calculation does not include Stale and Invalid shares.

item_1.title: Lightning speed
item_1.description: We use specialized high-performance server clusters powered by superfast software designed to handle over 100 TH/s.

item_2.title: Just Better
item_2.description: You can forget your poor mining experience. Flexpool is backed by high-quality support, and we are always happy to help!

chia.chia_comming_soon_text: We are getting ready to launch our Chia pool. Stay tuned for more details. Sign up for email updates or join us below to become one of the first Chia miners on Flexpool!

cookie_consent.cookie_consent_text: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience.
